item.description:
A candlelight vigil to honor the memory of the brave Delhi rape-victim, Nirbhaya, who passed away yesterday bravely fighting for her life

Description
The brave, resilient and beautiful Nirbhaya (fearless) soul lost her fighting battle yesterday and succumbed to her injuries suffered as a result of the barbaric actions of a few men. Let's honor her memory and show our support, not only for her, but for all women who brave harassment and abuse on a daily basis.

We, as a nation, have to change! Let's come together on Sunday (12.30.12) for a candlelight vigil to show our unwavering support to all women around the world and pay our respect to the one woman who's unfortunate battle has united a nation.

What: A candlelight vigil to honor the memory of Nirbhaya, the 23-year old Delhi gang-rape victim who passed away on Saturday

Where: Outside Trinity Church, Back Bay (206 Clarendon Street, Boston)

When: Sunday, 12.30.12 at 6:30 PM

Media Coverage -
CNN: http://edition.cnn.com/2012/12/29/world/asia/india-rape-victim/index.html?hpt=hp_t1

TOI: http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Delhi-gang-rape-13-days-that-stopped-a-nation/articleshow/17807811.cms

Please forward this to everyone you know and RSVP
item.name: Candlelight Vigil for Brave Nirbhaya, Sun Dec 30 at 630PM
